title: Android apps are coming to Windows 11 today, with over a thousand apps
content:
Last month, Microsoft said a bunch of new features are coming to Windows 11, and today, the firm is announcing availability. The biggest news is that Android apps are available for non-Insiders to start using in preview today. The Windows Subsystem for Android is here When Microsoft announced Windows 11 last year, it said that

The post Android apps are coming to Windows 11 today, with over a thousand apps appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft is announcing availability of several new Windows 11 features, such as Android apps, a clock on a second monitor, and more.
